label: 前原一誠
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: まえばら いっせい
説明文: (1834-76). Earlier: SASE. Choshu loyalist; apparently son of lower samurai. Student of Yoshida Shoin. Promoted to office and samurai rank. Associate of Takasugi Shinsaku. High office in Meiji government, but retired to Chushu, 1871. Led unsuccessful samurai revolt, 1876.
